attributes.action: For complementary therapies to be offered on the NHS
attributes.additional_details: We the people of the United Kingdom would like to campaign for a free NHS service on complementary therapies including Acupuncture, Shiatsu, Homeopathy, Herbalism and Reflexology. The physical and psychological benefits of those therapies will greatly reduce overcrowded GP's and Hospital admissions and will contribute to a healthier happier society
